column4: hi all i just installed ubuntu10.10 on my lenovo laptop, how to configure for broadband internet? it detects hardware and the login page opens but it's not connecting after i give login details
what type of broadband connection is it?
yes, phone, modem and ethernet cable
what is this type of broadband connection called?
any suggestions for my connection issue?
can you describe the login page?
http://reliancebroadband.co.in/reliance/login.do?action=doLoginSubmit, this is the page after logging in..
did you get any idea about my login page?
I couldn't connect directly to the site. its only being served up to systems they're connected to, I'm trying to google up some more useful instructions
by your statements of describe the login page, what input are you expecting from me? can you help me out?
mine is not a netconnect internet connection with USB for internet connection, i am using ethernet plug for internet connection, wil that link still is useful in my case?
that link looks like is not exactly a 1:1 match for my problem.mine is not a mobile broadband connection..any comments?
ip route output is: 124.125.44.0/22 dev eth0 proto kernel scope link src 124.125.46.131 metric 1
those 3 lines are the output of ip route
